resources.string: This app needs access to your camera so you can take pictures.
Looks like you\'re offline. Please reconnect and refresh to continue using YAP.
Start using your account to see all your transactions here
Unknown error. Please try again later.
This amount exceeds your daily transaction limit
Uh oh! You‚Äôll need to have a minimum balance of %1s plus the fee stated to proceed with this payment.
Your entered amount should be between %1s and %2s
Are you sure you want to Exit?
The information you‚Äôve entered will be lost
Your image has been saved to your gallery.
Camera and Storage permissions are needed to capture image. Turning off any permission won\'t allow application run smoothly. Please turn on all requested permissions from Settings > Permissions.
Contacts permissions are needed to get contacts. Turning off any permission won\'t allow application run smoothly. Please turn on all requested permissions from Settings > Permissions.
This app may not work correctly without the requested permissions.

Hey! 
%2$s would like to send you some money via YAP. Download the app now and join YAP‚Äôs fast growing community!

Download YAP here:

%3$s
Mobile No are not the same
The input must have length between %1$d and %2$d.
The input length must be greater than or equal to %1$d characters.
The input length must be less than or equal to %1$d characters.
The field value does not match the required format.
This doesn\'t match the previously entered PIN
We\'ve sent a verification code to\n %1s
Create a 4 digit passcode to access your account
By creating a passcode you agree to our \nTerms & Conditions
Please validate your email address after signing up and we promise not to spam you.

Due to all the excitement of our official launch, we are gradually activating as many accounts as possible to keep the app running smoothly. In the meantime, until your account is ready to be fully activated you‚Äôll be placed in a queue.
A YAP account has been created for you in less than %1s seconds!
A YAP Personal Account has been created for you!
Thanks %1s! Verify your details are exactly as per your CNIC.
Your details should be accurate to your CNIC.
Sorry, we\'re unable to activate your YAP account at this time. We\'re working on it and we will let you know once resolved.
Sorry, we can\'t issue a business account to anyone under 21.
Sorry, we can‚Äôt issue a business account to anyone under 21.
Sorry, it looks like you\'re Emirates ID has expired. You must have a valid Emirates ID to apply for a business account.
We ask this for security purpose
What is your place of birth?
We ask this for security purpose
Hold your device at eye level and look straight into the camera.
Tips : Take in good lighting and take off your glasses
Align your face in the center of the circle, and press the button
Make sure your face is clear and the photo is not blurry
What name would you like on your card?
Please keep this as close to your real name.
We can only print 26 characters on the card, so if you have a long name, we suggest you use initials where possible.
I‚Äôd like to edit my name
What name would you like on your card?
Please keep this as close to your real name
We can only print 26 characters on the card, so if you have a long name, we suggest you use initials where possible.
Your card is ready to be \ndelivered!
Confirm this is your address, you can change it anytime

Yap determines your current location. Your location may be shown on map and is used to provide things such direction and in order to serve personalize alert. This allows for a better overall app experience.
Your card is on it\'s way!
You will receive a message from our designated delivery company to confirm the date and time of delivery. Please make sure you have your CNIC on you at the time of delivery.
Enter the OTP sent to your registered mobile number to complete login
That doesn\'t look right. Please try again
Enter your passcode to access your account
Sorry, that‚Äôs too many incorrect attempts. Click on Forgot passcode to set a new one.
Your ID has expired. Please ensure you update your card to continue accessing YAP
Your EID is required.\nTap to update to ensure account continuity
Check your Internet connection and try again.
You have turned on the airplane mode.
You have turned on the airplane mode!
We\'ve sent a verification code to
Your phone number has been changed to
Your email address has been changed to
Sharing is sweet, and it‚Äôs even better when you do it with friends. Send this special link to your special people so they change the way they bank too!
Hey! I just joined the Pakistan\'s newest banking app ‚Äì YAP. Transform the way you bank and reserve your place in the queue to be one of the first to join me in the banking revolution.\n\n%1s
This app may not work correctly without the requested permissions. Open the app settings screen to modify app permissions.
Would you like to use Touch ID to log in to your account?
Make sure your device settings for Touch ID are always on.
By clicking ‚ÄúUse Touch ID‚Äù you agree to our Terms & Conditions
Would you like to receive notifications from us?
We use push notifications to give you updates about all transactions and to send important reminders about your account.
Your passcode has been changed successfully
Your passcode has been updated successfully
We will notify you when you\‚Äôve reached the top. Log back in to see your updated place in the queue.
Boost yourself up the queue by %1s for every friend you refer that signs up.üöÄ
Once your referred friends sign up, you will see their names listed below and your place in the queue bumped up by %1s spots for each friend!
You have been bumped up by %1s spots.
%1s, you reached the top of the Queue!
You are now ready to fully activate and begin using your YAP account.
Make sure you have your CNIC at hand before we proceed
A YAP Personal Account has been created for you in less than %1s seconds!
A YAP Personal Account has been created for you!
Make sure you have your Emirates ID at hand before we proceed

Due to all the excitement of our official launch, we are gradually activating as many accounts as possible to keep the app running smoothly. In the meantime, until your account is ready to be fully activated you‚Äôll be placed in a queue.
Your new password has been created successfully
Unfortunately, we‚Äôre unable to proceed with creating your account at this time. However, we do appreciate your interest in getting a YAP account.
A member from our customer service team will reach out to you.
This card is on the way
Complete verification to get your card
Create a PIN to start using your card
Great, looks like you just received your YAP card!
Now create a unique 4-digit PIN code to be able to use your debit card for purchases and withdrawals
Re-enter your PIN code to confirm
By creating a PIN code you agree to our \nTerms & Conditions
You‚Äôre all set! \nTime to top up
Begin using your YAP card by topping up your card with PKR 100 or more
Complete verification to get your card
Your primary card is on its way
How do you want to add money?
This is your YAP account summary. Use these details to transfer funds from another account into YAP.
Start using your card to see all your transactions here
Allow your card to withdraw from cash machines
Allow your card to be used for purchases made over the internet
Allow your card to be used at retail outlets. This includes restaurants, petrol stations and hospitality venues
Great, you‚Äôve successfully updated your PIN!
Remember this PIN as you‚Äôll need it for all you transactions, and make sure you don‚Äôt share it with anyone
Great, you‚Äôve successfully updated your PIN!
Remember this PIN as you‚Äôll need it for all you transactions, and make sure you don‚Äôt share it with anyone
Tell us what happened to your card
Click \'block and report\' to confirm that your card has been lost, damaged or stolen. We will immediately block your card and report it to our security team.
If you suspect any malicious activity or need to provide us with any other essential information regarding your card\'s disappearance, please give our customer care center at %1s
Your card will now be permanently blocked. Once blocked, it will no longer be in use. Please note, your card number will change. Don‚Äôt worry, you can request a new card at any time.
Your card has been permanently blocked and a new card has been ordered and is on the way
An agent will get in touch with you soon to arrange the delivery. Please keep your CNIC at hand.
Is this your address? Otherwise choose your location from the map below
None of your friends have YAP yet.\nInvite them now and earn %1s for every friend that stars using YAP!
Invite contacts from your address book
Who do you want to send money to?
How do you want to send money?
Add a debit or credit card to top up
Choose which card you want to top up with
Your card has been added successfully
Top up now with this card?
This card will be removed from your top-up methods.
Note that the issuing bank may have its own charges
Enter the CVV to top up your account with %1s
You have now added %1s to your account
Get YAP free card and enjoy %1s benefits
Card description here.\nBuy this card now for %1s and enjoy all benefits
Unfortunately, we‚Äôre unable to proceed with creating your account at this time. However, we do appreciate your interest in getting a YAP account.
Looks like your CNIC is expired!
To complete your YAP account. please re-scan with a valid CNIC and try again.
Unfortunately, YAP is only available to users over the age of 18. But don‚Äôt worry! We‚Äôre working on bringing something special to our younger audiences soon üòâ
Oops! You‚Äôre CNIC is linked to another account!
Your CNIC is already linked to another account! Please log out and try logging into that account. If you forgot your details, please reach out to our customer service team for help.
Oops, looks like that CNIC doesn‚Äôt exist!
To complete your YAP account, please re-scan with a valid CNIC and try again.
Choose which card you want to pay fee with
Send money to this beneficiary now?

Send money to contacts outside your YAP network by adding them as a beneficiary. You can do so by tapping the add button on the top right of this screen. For now, start adding beneficiaries by clicking below.
Are you sure you want to delete this beneficiary?
Share your unique YAP QR payments code to proceed
Scan a YAP QR payments code to proceed
"Hi! its %1s \nHere is my YAP QR Code, please scan it for money transactions."
Scanned QR code belongs to your own YAP account. Please scan another QR code.
